announcement: "Great news! Amazon Cognito is now available in the ap-south-2 region, making it easier for developers to add secure user authentication and authorization to their applications. With Cognito, you can simplify user management, enhance security, and provide a seamless user experience - all while keeping costs low. Leverage the power of this reliable and scalable service to take your applications to the next level."
headline: Amazon Cognito Now Available in ap-south-2 Region

announcement: "Introducing Amazon Managed Workflows for Apache Airflow (MWAA) - a fully managed Apache Airflow service that makes it easy to run open-source Airflow on AWS. MWAA abstracts away the complexity of deploying and managing Airflow infrastructure, allowing developers to focus on building and running their data pipelines. For business executives, MWAA provides a cost-effective and scalable solution for running Airflow-powered data analytics and machine learning workloads."
headline: Unlock the Power of Apache Airflow with Amazon Managed Workflows for Apache Airflow
resources: [{"M":{"title":{"S":"Amazon Managed Workflows for Apache Airflow"},"url":{"S":"https://aws.amazon.com/managed-workflows-for-apache-airflow/"}}},{"M":{"title":{"S":"Getting Started with Amazon MWAA"},"url":{"S":"https://docs.aws.amazon.com/mwaa/latest/userguide/getting-started.html"}}}]
service: Amazon Managed Workflows for Apache Airflow

announcement: "We're excited to announce that AWS Elemental MediaLive is now available in the me-central-1 region! This fully managed live video processing service makes it easy for developers to create reliable, scalable, and low-latency video experiences for your applications. With seamless integration to other AWS services, you can build end-to-end video workflows to serve your customers in the me-central-1 area with high performance and reliability. Contact our sales team to learn more about how MediaLive can transform your video delivery."
headline: AWS Elemental MediaLive Now Available in me-central-1 Region

announcement: "Exciting news, everyone! Amazon Braket, the fully managed quantum computing service, is now available in additional AWS Regions. Developers and researchers can now leverage the power of quantum computing to explore new frontiers and push the boundaries of innovation. Whether you're looking to accelerate your research, build cutting-edge applications, or simply experiment with the latest quantum technology, Amazon Braket has you covered. Discover the endless possibilities that quantum computing holds for your organization. Dive in and start your quantum journey today!"
headline: Amazon Braket Expands to New AWS Regions
